data.text:
What an incredible time at the MarkLogic World Tour in Amsterdam! From keynotes to hands-on sessions, it was packed with valuable insights and networking opportunities. Join us at the MarkLogic World Tour in Washington D.C. this September! Whether you're a data enthusiast, a professional, or curious about the future of data, this event is for you. Unlock the Future of Data Innovation with industry leaders and professionals. Dive into workshops and expand your knowledge on: üîπ Data Visualization: Turn raw data into compelling stories. üîπ Knowledge Management: Harness and leverage organizational knowledge. üîπ Generative AI: Explore how AI is reshaping data science. üìÖ Date: September 23‚Äì25 üìç Location: Bethesda Marriott üöÄ Shape the future of data with us. Register now! https://prgress.co/4bBVDmr #DataPlatform #MarkLogicWorldTour #AI #MarkLogic #Semaphore

Did you know that nearly one in three disenrolled adults discovered that they had been dropped from Medicaid only when they sought health care? Read this insightful article by Seth M., Principal Solutions Engineer for Progress Corticon, on how improving data integrity and decision automation challenges in Medicaid can impact millions of lives. https://prgress.co/3Sc3iBf

üöÄ Transform Your Content Strategy with Generative AI! Join us for an exclusive webinar where we dive into the transformative power of generative AI in knowledge discovery and content delivery. Date & Time. 24th of July, 11am ET Speaker: David Kaaret, Senior Principal Solutions Engineer at Progress Key Topics: ‚Ä¢ Enhance content discoverability with AI-driven insights ‚Ä¢ Provide better answers to complex user queries ‚Ä¢ Seamlessly transition your content applications to the AI era üîó Register Now https://prgress.co/3VZhfDG #GenAI #Progress #MarkLogic #KnowledgeManagement #DataPlatform

‚ùóTomorrow! Join us for an exciting AI Roundtable alongside Google, Mathematica, bookend.ai and LiquidMetal AI. Come find out how the Progress Data platform can help you solve for poor data quality, inadequate risk controls, and escalating costs in your GenAI projects. We'll also demonstrate how our Progress semantic RAG solution provides an agile and scalable enterprise AI Data Platform from which you can build your trustworthy and accurate AI-powered applications. Register today: https://lnkd.in/etEWa4iK #ai #generativeAI #datamanagement #dataplatform

Plus, get a live demonstration of how the Progress semantic RAG solution is solving the challenges that enterprises face when trying to leverage AI in their business.
